name: Seed of Skandha
description:
After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG: Deals 1 Piercing DMG to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> Deals 1 $[K5] to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
